link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/non-numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/nonNumeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: Company's financial year end date must be greater than Company's financial year start date
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat mestilah lebih besar daripada tarikh mula tahun kewangan Syarikat
Company's financial year start date MUST be reported.
Tarikh mula tahun kewangan syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
Company's financial year end date is MUST be reported
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat MESTI dilaporkan

Any one of "Employee Share Option Scheme" or "Others matters that relates to Director's report" or "Director's interests in shares or debentures" or "Director's interests in receiving benefit or fixed salary" MUST be reported.

Sama ada "Skim Opsyen Saham Pekerja" atau "Perkara lain yang berkaitan dengan laporan Pengarah" atau "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam saham atau debentur" atau "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam penerimaan faedah atau gaji tetap" MESTI dilaporkan.

va:valueAssertion.test: ($V1) eq 'Yes' or ($V2) eq 'Yes' or ($V4) eq 'Yes' or ($V5) eq 'Yes'

gen:link.msg:message: Any one of "Employee Share Option Scheme" or "Others matters that relates to Director's report" or "Director's interests in shares or debentures" or "Director's interests in receiving benefit or fixed salary" MUST be reported as "Yes".

Sama ada "Skim Opsyen Saham Pekerja" atau "Perkara lain yang berkaitan dengan laporan Pengarah" atau "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam saham atau debentur" atau "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam penerimaan faedah atau gaji tetap" MESTI dilaporkan sebagai "Yes".

va:valueAssertion.test: not(empty($V2)) and not(empty($V3)) and not(empty($V4)) and not(empty($V5))

gen:link.msg:message: When filer selects "Employee Share Option Scheme" as "Yes" THEN "Specify the highest amount of option shares granted", "Specify the lowest amount of option shares granted", "Specify numbers of employees offered by this share option schemes " and "Description of reasons why company apply for relief from requirements as to form and contents of directors report under sub category employee share option scheme " MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Skim Opsyen Saham Pekerja" sebagai "Yes" KEMUDIAN "Nyatakan jumlah tertinggi saham opsyen yang diberikan", "Nyatakan jumlah terendah saham opsyen yang diberikan", "Nyatakan bilangan pekerja yang ditawarkan oleh skim opsyen saham ini " dan "Penerangan sebab syarikat memohon pelepasan daripada kehendak mengenai bentuk dan kandungan laporan pengarah di bawah sub kategori skim opsyen saham pekerja" MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Others matters that relates to Director's report" as "Yes" THEN "Description of reasons why company apply for relief from requirements as to form and contents of directors report under sub category others" MUST be reported

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")
($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: Apabila pemfail memilih "Perkara lain yang berkaitan dengan laporan Pengarah" sebagai "Yes" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sebab syarikat memohon pelepasan daripada kehendak mengenai bentuk dan kandungan laporan pengarah di bawah sub kategori lain" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: When filer selects "Director's interests in shares or debentures" as "Yes" THEN "Description of reasons why company apply for relief from requirements as to form and contents of directors report under sub category director's interest in shares or debentures" MUST be reported

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")
($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: Apabila pemfail memilih "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam saham atau debentur" sebagai "Yes" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sebab syarikat memohon pelepasan daripada kehendak mengenai bentuk dan kandungan laporan pengarah di bawah sub kategori kepentingan pengarah dalam saham atau debentur" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: When filer selects "Director's Interests in receiving benefit or fixed salary" as "Yes" THEN "Description of reasons why company apply for relief from requirements as to form and contents of directors report under sub category relief to disclose benefits or contract" MUST be reported

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")
($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: Apabila filer memilih "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam penerimaan faedah atau gaji tetap" sebagai "Ya" maka "Penerangan sebab syarikat memohon pelepasan daripada kehendak mengenai bentuk dan kandungan laporan pengarah di bawah sub kategori pelepasan untuk mendedahkan faedah atau kontrak" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA4A" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: When filer selects "Director's Interests in receiving benefit or fixed salary" as "Yes" THEN "Type of Director's Interests in receiving benefit or fixed salary", "Name of directors" , "Identification number" OR "Passport number" MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam penerimaan faedah atau gaji tetap" sebagai "Yes" KEMUDIAN "Jenis kepentingan Pengarah dalam penerimaan faedah atau gaji tetap", "Nama pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan" ATAU "Nombor pasport" MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Director's interests in shares or debentures" as "Yes" THEN "Type of directors interests in shares or debentures", "Name of directors" , "Identification number" OR "Passport number" MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Kepentingan Pengarah dalam saham atau debentur" sebagai "Yes" KEMUDIAN "Jenis kepentingan pengarah dalam saham atau debentur", "Nama pengarah", "Nombor pengenalan" ATAU "Nombor pasport" MESTI dilaporkan
Date of submission should be within 5 months from "Company's financial year end date"
Tarikh serahan hendaklah dalam tempoh 5 bulan dari "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan syarikat"
